page.title: 15John Barrett's Weekend
page.content: On the weekend of the{Church Crawl {John Barrett}got up at{07.00}on Saturday morning and had cornflakes and tea for breakfast.After breakfast he went to a church in{Nuneaton}and played some games .He had dinner at 13.00. They had beef,new potatoes,peas and gravy. They stayed here a little longer then went to a{church service {for about an}hour.After this they went back to the village hall and had{chips {and batches}for tea.He got to bed at 23.00. On Sunday he got up at {07.00 and went to the church for breakfast He had cornflakes and tea.Then he went on a 7 mile walk to Corley.When they got there the organizers gave them dinner of lamb chops.After dinner they went to a park to play rounders.They had tea here and then got home at 21.00.
